[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@remirror/core-extensions](./core-extensions.md) &gt; [HistoryExtensionOptions](./core-extensions.historyextensionoptions.md) &gt; [newGroupDelay](./core-extensions.historyextensionoptions.newgroupdelay.md)

## HistoryExtensionOptions.newGroupDelay property

The delay (ms) between changes after which a new group should be started. Note that when changes aren't adjacent, a new group is always started.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newGroupDelay?: number | null;
```
